verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to the land <WH776> shadowing <WH6767> with wings <WH3671>, which is beyond <WH5676> the rivers <WH5104> of Ethiopia <WH3568>:

That sendeth <WH7971> <WH8802> ambassadors <WH6735> by the sea <WH3220>, even in vessels <WH3627> of bulrushes <WH1573> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325>, saying, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, ye swift <WH7031> messengers <WH4397>, to a nation <WH1471> scattered <WH4900> <WH8794> and peeled <WH4178> <WH8794>, to a people <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> from their beginning hitherto <WH1973>; a nation <WH1471> meted out <WH6978> and trodden down <WH4001>, whose land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled <WH958> <WH8804> !

All ye inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the world <WH8398>, and dwellers <WH7931> <WH8802> on the earth <WH776>, see <WH7200> <WH8799> ye, when he lifteth up <WH5375> <WH8800> an ensign <WH5251> on the mountains <WH2022>; and when he bloweth <WH8628> <WH8800> a shofar <WH7782>, hear <WH8085> <WH8799> ye.

For so <WH3541> the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8804> unto me, I will take my rest <WH8252> <WH8799>, and I will consider <WH5027> <WH8686> in my dwelling place <WH4349> like a clear <WH6703> heat <WH2527> upon herbs <WH216>, and like a cloud <WH5645> of dew <WH2919> in the heat <WH2527> of harvest <WH7105>.

For afore <WH6440> the harvest <WH7105>, when the bud <WH6525> is perfect <WH8552> <WH8800>, and the sour grape <WH1155> is ripening <WH1580> <WH8802> in the flower <WH5328>, he shall both cut off <WH3772> <WH8804> the sprigs <WH2150> with pruning hooks <WH4211>, and take away <WH5493> <WH8689> and cut down <WH8456> <WH8689> the branches <WH5189>.

They shall be left <WH5800> <WH8735> together <WH3162> unto the fowls <WH5861> of the mountains <WH2022>, and to the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>: and the fowls <WH5861> shall summer <WH6972> <WH8804> upon them, and all the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776> shall winter <WH2778> <WH8799> upon them.

In that time <WH6256> shall the present <WH7862> be brought <WH2986> <WH8714> unto the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> of a people <WH5971> scattered <WH4900> <WH8794> and peeled <WH4178> <WH8794>, and from a people <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> from their beginning hitherto <WH1973>; a nation <WH1471> meted out <WH6978> and trodden under foot <WH4001>, whose land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled <WH958> <WH8804>, to the place <WH4725> of the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, the mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>.
